name: FORCE TANKS
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
In Force Tanks, you fight alone on a range against an army of opponents!

Help your army detain the enemy's offensive on his legendary tank!

You are fighting alone, in the name of an armistice all over the world!

You will be attacked by a whole army of soldiers, tanks and armored cars!

Try to repulse the attack and go on the offensive against the enemy!

You are the last tankman in your army, you are a legend, you are the only hope of your army!

The enemy tanks will have double armor, try to pierce it!

Avoid collision with the enemy army otherwise you will take lives that you do not have much.

Remember you are a legend!
